mapper.select: /* com.ddit.proj.mapper.ScheduleMapper.getRecordApply */ SELECT a.sch_code , a.mem_no , a.sch_ttl , TO_CHAR(a.sch_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sch_dt , TO_CHAR(a.sch_st, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sch_st , TO_CHAR(a.sch_et, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sch_et , c_sch_se.code_nm AS code_sch_se , c_sch_mem.code_nm AS code_sch_mem , m.mem_nm AS mem_nm FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN ( SELECT group_id FROM group_code b WHERE b.group_yn = 'Y' and b.group_id = 'SCHE' ) d ON a.SCH_DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN code c_sch_se ON a.code_sch_se = c_sch_se.code_id AND d.group_id = c_sch_se.group_id LEFT JOIN code c_sch_mem ON a.code_sch_mem = c_sch_mem.code_id AND d.group_id = c_sch_mem.group_id LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON a.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE a.SCH_DEL_YN = 'N' AND a.SCH_CODE = #{schCode}

/* com.ddit.proj.mapper.ScheduleMapper.getAllRecordApply */ SELECT a.sch_code , a.mem_no , a.sch_ttl , TO_CHAR(a.sch_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sch_dt , TO_CHAR(a.sch_st, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sch_st , TO_CHAR(a.sch_et, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sch_et , c_sch_se.code_nm AS code_sch_se , c_sch_mem.code_nm AS code_sch_mem , m.mem_nm AS mem_nm FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN ( SELECT group_id FROM group_code b WHERE b.group_yn = 'Y' and b.group_id = 'SCHE' ) d ON a.SCH_DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN code c_sch_se ON a.code_sch_se = c_sch_se.code_id AND d.group_id = c_sch_se.group_id LEFT JOIN code c_sch_mem ON a.code_sch_mem = c_sch_mem.code_id AND d.group_id = c_sch_mem.group_id LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON a.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE a.SCH_DEL_YN = 'N'
